message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $17,000. I believe it's a great deal for both of us, as it's worth $15,000 to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product to you, but I am only willing to pay up to $15,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your offer but I'm not able to go that low.  I'm willing to come down to $16,000 to meet you halfway.  This still ensures a good deal for both of us, and I'm confident the product will be worth more than that to you.

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to come down in price. However, I am still unable to go above $15,000 for the product. I hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both of us.
